title: Macy's Executive Rachel Shechtman on Redefining Retail | Inside Fashion
itunes:title: Macy's Executive Rachel Shechtman on Redefining Retail | Inside Fashion
itunes:subtitle: Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed, the founder of Story and brand experience officer at Macy's discusses her innate love of retail and the challenges of creating "a living magazine."Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/B
description:
Speaking in conversation with Imran Amed, the founder of Story and brand experience officer at Macy's discusses her innate love of retail and the challenges of creating "a living magazine."

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
